name: Friday Night Funkin': Mid-Fight Masses
summary: Mid-Fight Masses, also called Sarvente's Mid-Fight Masses, is a Friday Night Funkin' mod that adds in two weeks with 5 songs in total, cutscenes, and various other features, such as a remix of the Tutorial. In this mod, Boyfriend and Girlfriend are trying to look for a bathroom, but manage to stumble into a church. In the church, they end up rap battling the "nun", Sarvente.
